charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. 846 AND 841 (b)(1)(B) - CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE 5 GRAMS OR MORE OF METHAMPHETAMINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 176 Months Imprisonment. This term consists of 120 months as to Count One and 56 months as to Count Two of the Indictment, to be served consecutively. 8 Years Supervised Release. $200 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. 843(a)(6) - KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY POSSESS EQUIPMENT, CHEMICALS, PRODUCTS, AND MATERIALS USED TO MANUFACTURE METHAMPHETAMINE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 176 Months Imprisonment. This term consists of 120 months as to Count One and 56 months as to Count Two of the Indictment, to be served consecutively. 8 Years Supervised Release. $200 Special Assessment
